statements.query: MATCH (n:DOProject{account_id:$DO_ACCOUNT_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
statements.__comment__: Delete DigitalOcean Projects that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:DOProject)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:DOAccount) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
statements.__comment__: Remove DigitalOcean Account-to-Project relationships that are out of date.
